actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution for negotiations on the Turkish opium ban.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should (1) immediately initiate negotiations at the highest level of the Turkish Government to prevent the resumption of opium production; and (2) if such negotiations prove unfruitful, exercise the authority provided by the Congress under the Foreign Assistance Act, to terminate all assistance to the Government of Turkey.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution for negotiations on the Turkish opium ban.
